title: N.C. Senate Race Expected To Be One Of The Most Expensive In The U.S.
teaser: We take a look at the Senate race in the state being called the "ground zero" of American politics: North Carolina.
contentencoded:
North Carolina will be one of the most closely watched states in the battle for control of Congress this fall. Democratic Senator Kay Hagan will square off against Republican Thom Tillis, who is Speaker of the North Carolina House. It’s expected to be one of the most expensive races in the country.

North Carolina Public Radio’s Jessica Jones joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson from Raleigh to discuss the Senate race in that state.

  • Senate race in N.C. sets the stage for 2016 presidential competition

Guest

  • Jessica Jones, capitol bureau chief at North Carolina Public Radio. She tweets @Jessica_WUNC.
